Articles.Content:
Please spare a few minutes of your time to check out my STOCK Cargo Plane... I sort of based it on a C-130...

It carries 2 light Reconnaissance Vehicles, and has a capacity of 15+ Kerbalnauts...

I'm also uploading a expedition to the North Pole, video... so be sure to check out the journey!

p.s. skip a couple of minutes through the video to get to the good bits!

Its very functional but sorry when I look at it I just think of a bread box.
You ever seen the Shorts Skyvan? That's a flying breadbox if I've ever seen one!

I actually made a replica of the Short SC.7 Skyvan. I had the opportunity of jumping from it in two tandem jumps and was around it for about a week, so I thought I'd make a copy of it, though because I just used Mk3 fuselage it's not as square as I wanted it to be. Though its very close, will upload craft file if anyone wants it, flies pretty well.

1 hour ago, jahrand said:

-Stuff-

This thread is a couple of years old. Maybe consider making your own thread about your craft?

I think Callisto's Cargo Plane has a 'little' messy design if used in 1.0.5 until 1.2 Beta, or above. Now, we already have the finest Cargo Plane Parts among other parts in older version. It even gives you Cargo Doors and for addition, we have Turbofan Jet Engines in 1.0.5 and above.

 

Callisto, the message I wrote  above isn't for insulting, but your design needs a little bit tweaking with the usage of some mods.
Seeing as this thread is 2 years old, I suspect he's beyond caring. Closed.
